Package com.csse3200.game.minigames.maze.entities.mazenpc

Class Octopus

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.entities.Entity
com.csse3200.game.minigames.maze.entities.mazenpc.MazeEntity
com.csse3200.game.minigames.maze.entities.mazenpc.Octopus
public class Octopus extends MazeEntity
AnglerFish represents a non-playable character (NPC) in the maze mini-game. It is a hostile entity that chases the player and attacks it.

  • Constructor Details

    • Octopus

      public Octopus(Entity target, MazeEntityConfig config)
      Constructs an AnglerFish entity with the given target and configuration.
      Parameters:
      target - The entity that this AnglerFish will chase (e.g., the player).
      config - The configuration stats for this NPC, such as health and attack power.
